name: Switch-back
description:
A route-finding, route-building  puzzle game with two dissimilar but mutually dependent mechanics. Coordinate red and blue to solve the puzzles. 

  • Number of puzzles: 16
  • Average play time: 1h
  • First published: September 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] (or backstep) to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

With thanks to members of the thinky-puzzle-games discord for play-testing and to Corey Hardt for the suggested puzzle title.

puzzlescript implementation - Andrea Gilbert - 2021  
puzzle concept and designs - Andrea Gilbert - 2021
